mutants.code:
import re

def filter_out_non_alphanumeric(sentence):
    sentence_words = sentence.lower().split()
    filtered_words = [re.findall('', word) for word in sentence_words]
    flattened_and_joined = ' '.join(sum(filtered_words, []))
    return flattened_and_joined

import re

def filter_out_non_alphanumeric(sentence):
    sentence_words = sentence.lower().split()
    filtered_words = [re.findall('\\b\\w{1,10}\\b', word) for word in sentence_words]
    flattened_and_joined = ''.join(sum(filtered_words, []))
    return flattened_and_joined
